entry.title: Monday: A mix of sun and cloud. Temperature steady near plus 2.

entry.title: Tuesday: Flurries or rain showers. High plus 2.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Flurries or rain showers beginning late in the morning and ending late in the afternoon. Local snowfall amount 2 cm. Wind becoming south 20 km/h then west 30 gusting to 50 early in the afternoon. High plus 2. Wind chill minus 12 in the morning. UV index 1 or low.
